welcome_text: Let's personalize Ralph and embark on this caring adventure together.
talk_to_vet_text: It seems your companion is experiencing more challenging days than joyful ones lately. It might be helpful to seek guidance from a veterinarian.
thank_you_text: Thank you for supporting my app!
support_me_text:
Please support my efforts.

This won't unlock any additional features, but it will help me keep the app updated and running.
introduction_text:
This app helps you monitor your pet's well-being, offering daily or weekly assessments and tracking trends over time.

Click in the chart on the <redDot /> to get started.
delete_pet_text: Are you sure you want to remove {{petName}}?
